CustomField.formula: IF( (!ISBLANK( Engineering_Start_Hold_Time__c ) && !ISBLANK( Engineering_End_Hold_Time__c )) , (( Engineering_End_Hold_Time__c- Engineering_Start_Hold_Time__c ) * 24+ IF( ISBLANK(Past_Engineering_in_Hours__c),0,Past_Engineering_in_Hours__c )) , IF( (!ISBLANK( Engineering_Start_Hold_Time__c) && ISBLANK( Engineering_End_Hold_Time__c )), (( now() - Engineering_Start_Hold_Time__c ) * 24+ IF( ISBLANK(Past_Engineering_in_Hours__c),0,Past_Engineering_in_Hours__c )),0))
CustomField.label: Waiting for Engineering in Hours
